New Records: Virgil van Dijk received his first red card with the Netherlands during the match.
Key Match Events: Hungary scored the opening goal after Tijjani Reijnders lost possession in midfield leading to Roland Sallai's goal.
Denzel Dumfries headed in a late equalizer for the Netherlands to rescue a draw.
Virgil van Dijk was sent off with two yellow cards, reducing the Netherlands to 10 men.
Post-Match Reflections: Denzel Dumfries praised the team's resilience after the draw.
Virgil van Dijk explained his actions leading to the red card.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Netherlands had over 80% possession in the first half but struggled to convert chances.
Hungary ended a 9-game losing streak against the Netherlands.
